_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four kinds of mindfulness meditation: Observing an aspect of the body internally
Observing an aspect of the body externally
Observing an aspect of feelings internally and externally
Observing an aspect of the mind internally and externally
Observing an aspect of principles internally and externally
How to define the undertaking of the fou: Meditating by observing an aspect of the body internally
Meditating by observing an aspect of the body externally
Meditating by observing an aspect of feelings internally and externally
Meditating by observing an aspect of the mind internally and externally
Meditating by observing an aspect of principles internally and externally
